trivy_fs.desc: Scan local filesystem for vulnerabilities, secrets, misconfigurations, licenses. Example: trivy fs /path/to/project

trivy_fs_file.desc: Scan a single file on filesystem. Example: trivy fs /path/to/file

trivy_image.desc: Scan container image for vulnerabilities & secrets. Example: trivy image python:3.4-alpine

trivy_image_config.desc: Scan container image metadata for misconfigurations. Example: trivy image --image-config-scanners config YOUR_IMAGE_NAME

trivy_image_misconfig.desc: Run specific scanners on container image. Example: trivy image --scanners config YOUR_IMAGE_NAME

trivy_image_license.desc: Scan container image for licenses. Example: trivy image --scanners license YOUR_IMAGE_NAME

trivy_repo.desc: Scan code repository for vulnerabilities & secrets. Example: trivy repo YOUR_REPO_URL_OR_PATH

trivy_repo_config.desc: Scan repository for misconfigurations. Example: trivy repo --scanners config YOUR_REPO_URL_OR_PATH

trivy_repo_license.desc: Scan repository for license issues. Example: trivy repo --scanners license YOUR_REPO_URL_OR_PATH

trivy_vm_file.desc: [EXPERIMENTAL] Scan local VM image for vulnerabilities. Example: trivy vm --scanners vuln disk.vmdk

trivy_vm_ami.desc: [EXPERIMENTAL] Scan AWS AMI for vulnerabilities. Example: trivy vm --scanners vuln ami:AMI_ID

trivy_vm_ebs.desc: [EXPERIMENTAL] Scan AWS EBS snapshot for vulnerabilities. Example: trivy vm ebs:EBS_SNAPSHOT_ID

trivy_aws.desc: [EXPERIMENTAL] Scan AWS account for misconfigurations. Example: trivy aws --region us-east-1

trivy_aws_service.desc: [EXPERIMENTAL] Scan specific AWS service. Example: trivy aws --region us-east-1 --service s3

trivy_sbom.desc: Scan SBOM file for vulnerabilities/licenses. Example: trivy sbom /path/to/sbom_file

trivy_vuln_package_relationship.desc: Filter vulnerability scan by package relationships. Example: trivy repo --pkg-relationships direct /path

trivy_secret_customfs.desc: Scan filesystem for secrets with custom config. Example: trivy fs --scanners secret --secret-config ./config.yaml /data
